Package commandLineApp

Class Farm

java.lang.Object
commandLineApp.Farm
public class Farm
extends java.lang.Object
This class implements the methods for the Farm in the farm simulator.
Version:
22 May 2020.
Author:
Hayley Krippner, Michelle Muchemwa

  • Constructor Details

    • Farm

      public Farm​(java.lang.String farmName, int gameDuration, int farmType, double farmMoney, double cropBonus, java.lang.Boolean hasHappinessBonus, double animalFeedBonus)
      This method creates a Farm. The current day is initialised to day 1. The number of daily actions is initialised to 2. The Farm begins with $0 total profit. The farm type perk is applied.
      Parameters:
      farmName - The name of the Farm
      gameDuration - The duration of the game
      farmType - The type of Farm
      farmMoney - The money of the Farm
      cropBonus - The Crop bonus
      hasHappinessBonus - Whether the Farm has Animal happiness bonus
      animalFeedBonus - The Animal Feed bonus applied in the generalStore

  • Method Details

    • toString

      public java.lang.String toString()
      This method displays Farm name, game duration, type and money in dollars.
      Overrides:
      toString in class java.lang.Object
      Returns:
      The Farm name, game duration, type and money.
